name: Sky Islands - Anime Dress Up
description:
Welcome to Sky Islands, young master! We hope you enjoy your stay!

Sky Islands is a mobile MMORPG designed to provide a wide-ranging entertainment experience, including various factors such as fashion, home décor, farming, management simulation, role-playing and social network.

---BACKGROUND ---
Famous for its magnificent scenery, Sky Islands is the dwelling of most elite noble families, as well as a favorite resorts location for sky travelers.
Join us and become a resident of Sky Islands. Create your own unique sky resort, immerse in the touching storyline, while enjoying the stimulating gameplay and stunning 2D chibi anime graphic

--- OUTSTANDING FEATURES - --

* Create, decorate and manage your own unique sky resort *
Each villa in your sky resort is a showroom for your limitless creativity. Generate a distinctive décor style of your own with thousands of decor objects and dyeing options available!
Get used to our basic resort management simulation in no time, supported by a tactical Skill system. A magnificent and successful sky resort will make you shine vividly among the nobles on Sky Islands.

* A fashion paradise with adorable 2D chibi-anime graphic *
Exquisite and super adorable, our 2D chibi-anime graphic will satisfy not only the dreamy teenage gamers but also everyone who loves to play cute dress-up games.
What’s more, the game also offers utmost customization experience to players: plenty of unique fashion items to choose from, along with various dyeing options. And last but not least, a customized Lookbook to show off your styles!

* A Palace Garden with various uncanny plants and pets *
Fellow farm gamers, we haven’t forgot about you! Aside from the dreamy sky resort and stunning fashion closet, Sky Islands also offer our residents a Palace Garden with plenty of enchanting plants and pets to take care of. Look after them everyday and harvest essential materials to upgrade and dye items as you wish!

* Stimulating storyline with Maid-Butler theme and charming noble characters *
Are you a fan of shoujo manga-anime, especially ones with noble Maid-Butler theme? Then get ready to become a prestigious noble, interact with many charming characters and immerse in our emotive storyline! Live your shoujo manga-anime dream right now!

* Perfect place to hang out and make new friends *
Would you like to walk your pretty character around, hang out and interact with other players? No problem, our engaging social interaction will grant your wish. We offer several trendy social features such as chat system, actions and emoticons, Friendlist, Pinata party, multiplayer mini games and even a screenshot feature so you can freely enjoy playing and living the moment together!

---JOIN US NOW on Sky Islands Facebook to catch the latest updates ---
https://www.facebook.com/SkyIslandsSUGA
